documentation.text:
@notice Address of the governing contract that this bridge receiver expects to
  receive messages from; likely an address from another chain (e.g. mainnet)

@notice Address of the timelock on this chain that the bridge receiver
 will send messages to
@notice Mapping of proposal ids to their full proposal data

documentation.text:
@notice Execute a queued proposal
 @param proposalId The id of the proposal to execute

params.proposalId: The id of the proposal to execute

params._govTimelock: Address of the governing contract that this contract will receive messages from (likely on another chain)
params._localTimelock: Address of the timelock contract that this contract will send messages to

returns._0: The state of the given proposal (queued, expired or executed)

govTimelock().notice: Address of the governing contract that this bridge receiver expects to  receive messages from; likely an address from another chain (e.g. mainnet)
